Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its high-quality features and exceptional performance, it's truly a valuable asset. I believe in its worth and am confident it would be an excellent addition to your collection. Considering its market value and the benefits it offers, I kindly propose a price of $120 for this product. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
